name: sales_offer_poster
description: Promo template with blue background, bold headline, cookie image, and CTA button

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: generate a prompt for a vibrant, high-resolution background featuring fresh fruits and natural elements. The image should have a clean, modern aesthetic with good contrast to ensure text remains readable. Include space in the center for product placement and text overlay.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: generate a prompt for your brand logo. For best results, use a high-resolution image with transparent background that represents your brand identity.
fieldPrompt.headline: Enter a compelling headline that grabs attention (max 20 characters). Focus on the main benefit or offer.
fieldPrompt.subtitle: Add a short, engaging subtitle that supports your headline (max 30 characters). Highlight key benefits or features.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (e.g., #4CAF50) that matches your brand and creates visual harmony with your product.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Enter a clear call-to-action (max 10 characters) that encourages immediate response (e.g., 'Shop Now', 'Learn More', 'Get Started').
fieldPrompt.product_image_url: generate a prompt for a high-quality image of the product. The image should be well-lit, professional, and evoke warmth and care. For best results, use an image with a transparent background or a clean, uncluttered background.
